mapper.sql: id, imgUrl, name, status, create_time, update_time, description, total_amount, total_count, max_annualized_rate, min_annualized_rate, max_borrow_period, max_borrow_period_type, min_borrow_period, min_borrow_period_type, progress, sale_complated_time, audit_time, vote_amount, sale_start_time, sale_end_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from ic_project_package
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into ic_project_package (id, imgUrl, name, status, create_time, update_time, description, total_amount, total_count, max_annualized_rate, min_annualized_rate, max_borrow_period, max_borrow_period_type, min_borrow_period, min_borrow_period_type, progress, sale_complated_time, audit_time, vote_amount, sale_start_time, sale_end_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxAnnualizedRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{minAnnualizedRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{maxBorrowPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxBorrowPeriodType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{minBorrowPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{minBorrowPeriodType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{progress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saleComplatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{voteAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{saleStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{saleEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

id,
imgUrl,
name,
status,
create_time,
update_time,
description,

min_borrow_period,
min_borrow_period_type,
progress,
sale_complated_time,
audit_time,
vote_amount,
sale_start_time,
sale_end_time,

mapper.update:
update ic_project_package
imgUrl = #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total_amount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
total_count = #{totalCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
max_annualized_rate = #{maxAnnualizedRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
min_annualized_rate = #{minAnnualizedRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
max_borrow_period = #{maxBorrowPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER},
max_borrow_period_type = #{maxBorrowPeriodType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
min_borrow_period = #{minBorrowPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER},
min_borrow_period_type = #{minBorrowPeriodType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
progress = #{progress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sale_complated_time = #{saleComplatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
vote_amount = #{voteAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sale_start_time = #{saleStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sale_end_time = #{saleEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ic_project_package set imgUrl = #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_amount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_count = #{totalCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, max_annualized_rate = #{maxAnnualizedRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, min_annualized_rate = #{minAnnualizedRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, max_borrow_period = #{maxBorrowPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, max_borrow_period_type = #{maxBorrowPeriodType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, min_borrow_period = #{minBorrowPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, min_borrow_period_type = #{minBorrowPeriodType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, progress = #{progress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sale_complated_time = #{saleComplatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, vote_amount = #{voteAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sale_start_time = #{saleStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sale_end_time = #{saleEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.delete: delete from ic_project_package where id in #{item}
mapper.select: select b.id, b.annualized_rate, b.`name`, b.borrower_type, b.borrow_period, b.total_amount, b.profit_type, b.borrow_period_type, b.`status`, b.online_time, b.sale_end_time, b.sale_complated_time, b.invest_type, (select f.available_balance from fin_balance f where f.source_id=b.id and f.balance_type =4 ) voteAmount from ic_project_package_link a,ic_project b where a.project_id=b.id and b.del_flag > 0 and a.project_package_id=#{projectPackageId} order by CASE WHEN b.status='30' THEN 10 WHEN b.status='20' THEN 20 WHEN b.status='50' THEN 21 WHEN (b.status='80' and b.sale_complated_time is not null) THEN 22 WHEN b.status='81' THEN 23 WHEN b.status='51' THEN 31 WHEN b.status='52' THEN 32 WHEN b.status='70' THEN 40 WHEN b.status='60' THEN 50 WHEN (b.status='80' and b.sale_complated_time is null) THEN 51 WHEN b.status='40' THEN 60 WHEN b.status='90' THEN 70 ELSE 100 end ,b.online_time DESC
select * from ic_project_package a where a.`status`=1 and a.progress!=100 ORDER BY a.progress+0 DESC LIMIT 1
select count(1) from ic_project_package p where p.status=1
select p.* from ic_project_package p where p.status=1 and p.progress!=100 order by p.progress+0 DESC LIMIT ${projectQuery.startRow}, ${projectQuery.pageSize}
select p.* from ic_project_package p where p.status=2 order by p.progress+0 DESC LIMIT ${projectQuery.startRow}, ${projectQuery.pageSize}

select b.id, b.annualized_rate, b.`name`, b.borrower_type, b.borrow_period, b.total_amount, b.profit_type, b.borrow_period_type, b.`status`, b.online_time, b.sale_end_time, b.sale_complated_time, b.invest_type, (select f.available_balance from fin_balance f where f.source_id=b.id and f.balance_type =4 ) voteAmount, b.thumbnail from ic_project_package_link a,ic_project b where a.project_id=b.id and b.del_flag > 0 and a.project_package_id=#{projectPackageId} order by CASE WHEN b.status='30' THEN 10 WHEN b.status='20' THEN 20 WHEN b.status='50' THEN 21 WHEN (b.status='80' and b.sale_complated_time is not null) THEN 22 WHEN b.status='81' THEN 23 WHEN b.status='51' THEN 31 WHEN b.status='52' THEN 32 WHEN b.status='70' THEN 40 WHEN b.status='60' THEN 50 WHEN (b.status='80' and b.sale_complated_time is null) THEN 51 WHEN b.status='40' THEN 60 WHEN b.status='90' THEN 70 ELSE 100 end ,b.id
select p.* from ic_project_package p where p.status=#{status} order by p.progress+0 DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
select count(1) from ic_project_package p where p.status=#{status}
select from ic_project_package where status=2 order by name
